comment.author: 55206606@N06
comment._content: Les1958: As someone who has eye problems which cannot (or rather, will not - thanks, doctors) be treated with glasses, I just want to point out that just because there are no eyeglasses, it doesn't mean there's noone suffering from any vision problems. That's like saying that noone died of cancer 100 years ago, merely from the basis that there was no technology to identify/attempt to treat cancer then. The illness wasn't documented or known of, but it didn't mean it didn't exist.
